props.name: click
props.description: Function to be called when clicked

props.name: dialog
props.description:
Dialog endpoint or options to be passed to `this.$panel.dialog.open()`.
Use instead of `link` or `drawer`.

props.name: drawer
props.description:
Drawer endpoint or options to be passed to `this.$panel.drawer.open()`.
Use instead of `link` or `dialog`.

props.name: info
props.description: Additional text of the stat (3rd line)

props.name: label
props.description: Label text of the stat (2nd line)

props.name: link
props.description:
Absolute or relative URL.
Use instead of `dialog` or `drawer`.

props.name: value
props.description: Main text of the stat (1st line)
